sentences.english: Dvorak was interested in the folk music of both Europe and North America.
sentences.chinese: 德沃夏克对欧洲和北美洲的民间音乐很有兴趣。

sentences.english: Dvorak also wrote a number of other symphonies and nine operas.
sentences.chinese: 德沃夏克还写过许多其他的交响曲和九部歌剧。

sentences.english: Dvorak made a number of visits to England.
sentences.chinese: 德沃夏克多次访问英国。
